data.title: Is it worth buying Animal Crossing: New Horizons to play offline only? Will I enjoy it without the online elements of the game?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 5): Absolutely, yes. Animal Crossing: New Horizons shines as a solo offline adventure, and hereâ€™s why.

First, understand that the core of Animal Crossing has always been about creating your own slice of paradise. It's a game that thrives on the simple joys of collecting, building, a...
